brand_names: Reoganic EX Whitening Pore Care Deodorant
warnings: [Precautions for use] 1. During using product or after use, if there are any abnormal symptoms or side effects such as red spots, swelling, or itching on the area of use due to direct sunlight, con sult with a specialist. 2. Refrain from using on areas with scars, etc. 3. Pre cautions for storage and handling A) Keep out of reach of children B) Store away from direct sunlight 4. For arbutin, papules and mild itching have been repo rted in 「Human Application Test Data」.
indications: Before use, remove sweat, water, and oil, and apply evenly to the armpit while rolling the ball in a clean state, then dry completely before wearing clothes.
